Sentencas: A combined power generation system consisting of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and a gas turbine (GT) with steam and heat recuperation (HR) was evaluated using a commercial process simulation tool, ASPEN Plus.
Titulo: Energy recuperation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) combined system

Sentencas: The effect of steam recuperation (SR) on the overall efficiency of the combined system was investigated by comparing the SOFC-GT during heat and steam recuperation (HSR) against the system during only heat recuperation.
Titulo: Energy recuperation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) combined system

Sentencas: At low turbine inlet temperatures (TITs), the overall efficiency of the SOFC-GT combined system with heat and steam recuperation improved by showing an increase in TIT and a reduction in pressure ratio (PR).
Titulo: Energy recuperation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) combined system

Sentencas: On the other hand, at high TITs, the opposite trend was observed.
Titulo: Energy recuperation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) combined system

Sentencas: The integration of steam recuperation was found to improve the overall efficiency and specific power of SOFC-GT combined systems with a relatively compact SOFC component.
Titulo: Energy recuperation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and gas turbine (GT) combined system
